customer_name.description: The full name of the customer (first and last name if available). May include letters, numbers, or '#' symbols.

address.description: The full address of the customer.

start_date_time.description: The date and time the service or job started (the earlier date/time).

end_date_time.description: The date and time the service or job ended (the later date/time).

deposit.description: The monetary amount of the deposit. It is the 'small number' or the number following 'deposit'.

total_price.description: The total monetary amount for the job. This is the 'bigger number' in the deposit format or the number following 'total price'.

sort_of_payment.description: The method of payment (e.g., cash, check, cc/credit card, etc.).

notes.description: Any free text or additional information, especially from a section titled 'note:'.

job_status.description: The status of the job, such as 'done', 'refund', or 'new' if status is not explicitly mentioned.

relevant.description: Indicates if the message contains sufficient information (e.g., a customer name or total price) to be considered relevant data for processing.
